stack.title: Technologies

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore the projects I‚Äôve developed, turning ideas into functional solutions through technology and design.

1.descripcion: Web app and PWA for a sushi chain, featuring an interactive digital menu and advanced order management. Optimizes internal operations and enhances the customer experience from any device.

2.descripcion: E-commerce platform for selling football jerseys. Includes product, category, and order management for sellers, and favorites functionality for customers.

3.descripcion: Collaborative fintech app that allows group payment splitting, generates receipts, shows real-time statuses, and lets friends share payment links.

4.descripcion: Citizen security app with geolocated alerts, public/private communities, AI-powered spam detection, and dangerous zone clustering.

5.descripcion: Logistics web system for container tracking. Includes geofencing, transport control, admin panel, and primary zones defined with maps.

6.descripcion: Route planning system with multiple vehicles and soft clustering (SoftCluVRP). Visualizes optimal routes, custom heuristics, and LKH comparisons.

experienceEducation.sectionDescription: Here I leave you a small summary of my work experience and also of my university studies, courses, and certifications.

experiences.title: Software developer
experiences.description: At WiseTrack I did my internship as a software developer, my main functions were under the innovation department, which consisted of designing and developing APIs for the integration of vehicle manufacturers such as Volvo Trucks, Volvo Cars and Scania Fleet Management. Also implement ETL processes to manage and process data provided by manufacturers.

experiences.title: FullStack Engineer
experiences.description: Logistics project for a salmon company: Developed a web application + PWA for personnel management and coordination using the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js). Designed and managed PostgreSQL databases, ensuring data integrity and performance. Implemented secure authentication with Google OAuth and integrated third-party APIs (climate and aviation services).
responsibilities: Developed a web application + PWA for personnel management and coordination using the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js).
Designed and managed PostgreSQL databases, ensuring data integrity and performance.
Implemented secure authentication with Google OAuth and integrated third-party APIs (climate and aviation services).

experiences.title: Development Leader
experiences.description: Promoted to Development Leader, responsible for directing and coordinating teams on strategic projects, including Personnel Logistics, Traceability System, and AI implementation for cataract detection in salmon. Conducted on-site visits to Puerto Montt to validate applications, managed meetings with clients and managers, and gathered requirements to align technological solutions with real business needs. Continued developing applications using the PERN stack, designing mockups, database diagrams, and developing both backend and frontend. Implemented Google OAuth authentication and integrated third-party APIs, strengthening the functionality and security of implemented solutions.
responsibilities: Project management and leadership: Promoted to Development Leader, responsible for directing and coordinating teams on strategic projects, including Personnel Logistics, Traceability System, and AI implementation for cataract detection in salmon.

Client interaction and requirements gathering: Conducted on-site visits to Puerto Montt to validate applications, managed meetings with clients and managers, and gathered requirements to align technological solutions with real business needs.
FullStack development and solution design: Continued developing applications using the PERN stack, designing mockups, database diagrams, and developing both backend and frontend.
Service integration and security: Implemented Google OAuth authentication and integrated third-party APIs, strengthening the functionality and security of implemented solutions.
